advanced.code:
graph TB
    A[Request] --> B{L1 Cache Hit?}
    B -->|Yes| C[Return from L1]
    B -->|No| D{L2 Cache Hit?}
    D -->|Yes| E[Return from L2]
    D -->|No| F{L3 Cache Hit?}
    F -->|Yes| G[Return from L3]
    F -->|No| H[Database Query]
    H --> I[Update L3]
    I --> J[Update L2]
    J --> K[Update L1]
    K --> L[Return Data]
    E --> K
    G --> J

    M[Data Update] --> N[Invalidate L1]
    N --> O[Invalidate L2]
    O --> P[Invalidate L3]
    P --> Q[Update DB]
